comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Pittsburgh endurance swimmer Joseph Callahan enjoys the fame of having accomplished one of the longest water jour neys on record in the Philippine Islands ... news.google.com/newspapers?id=ShUbAAAAIBAJ&sjid=y0gEA... I started a biography of him in Wikipedia: Joseph N. Callahan was a record winning endurance swimmer from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. In 1907 he set the record for swimming the 12 miles of Manila Bay in 4.5 hours. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_N._Callahan
